Description: Available 9/15, this 2 bed/1 bath unit is located on Webster Street in the highly sought after Jeffries Point neighborhood of East Boston. This beautiful unit boasts hardwood floors, a modern kitchen with stainless appliances a brand new bathroom and exposed brick. Perfect for the downtown commuter, this unit is located only an 8 minute walk from the Maverick T Station on the MBTA Blue Line. 1 stop to Aquarium or 2 stops to State, you'll have only a 15-20 minute door to door commute. For those that drive, East Boston residents pay only $0.20 toll for both Boston Harbor Tunnels making access to I-93 and I-90 a breeze. 1 block from the waterfront Piers Park, enjoy a good book by the water in this picturesque setting. 2 blocks from the Boston Harbor Shipyard & Marina which includes Downeast Cider Brewery and Tasting Room, ICA's Watershed installation. Steps to other bars & restaurants as The Quiet Few, Cunard Tavern and The Tall Ship. EMAIL AGENTS ONLY.
